About Me

I am a Junior Software Developer specializing in Full Stack and Cloud Development, with a strong foundation in backend architecture and software engineering best practices. I hold a B.Sc. in Computer Science from Ruppin Academic Center, with coursework in Data Structures and Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems, and AWS Cloud Development.

I have hands-on experience with a wide range of technologies:

Programming Languages: C, C#, Java, JavaScript
Frontend: React, Vite, HTML, CSS.
Backend: ASP.NET Core (REST APIs).
Databases: SQL, DynamoDB, Firebase Realtime Database.
Cloud & DevOps: Git, AWS services, Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3, Cognito, CloudWatch, EventBridge.
Core Concepts: Object Oriented Programming (OOP), RESTful APIs, Microservices, Serverless Architecture, Real-Time Systems.

I am actively seeking full time opportunities in Full Stack Development, Cloud Development, or Backend Engineering.

Codenames Game - AI-Integrated Real-Time Multiplayer

A sophisticated digital implementation of the popular board game Codenames, featuring real-time multiplayer functionality, AI integration with OpenAI GPT-4o, and comprehensive analytics.

Key Features:

  • Real-time Multiplayer: Instant synchronization across all players using Firebase Realtime Database
  • Advanced AI Integration: OpenAI GPT-4o for intelligent gameplay with custom AI personalities
  • Dual-Write Architecture: SQL Server for persistent storage + Firebase for real-time updates
  • Word Embedding Analysis: Interactive visualizations with similarity metrics using Chart.js
  • Social Features: Friends management, global chat, game invitations, and online presence
  • Hebrew & English Support: Bilingual gameplay with RTL support
React ASP.NET Core SQL Server Firebase OpenAI API Material-UI Tailwind CSS Chart.js
View on GitHub

On The Lake - AWS Serverless Hotel Booking Platform

A modern, full-stack hotel booking web application built entirely on AWS cloud infrastructure, featuring real-time room management, secure authentication, and a comprehensive admin dashboard.

Key Features:

  • 100% Serverless: Zero server maintenance with automatic scaling using AWS managed services
  • Secure Authentication: AWS Cognito with OAuth 2.0 and JWT tokens
  • Role-Based Access Control: Separate user and admin experiences with group-based permissions
  • Admin Dashboard: Full CRUD operations for rooms and bookings with image uploads to S3
  • Automated Monitoring: CloudWatch metrics with EventBridge scheduled tasks
  • 12 Lambda Functions: RESTful APIs handling all business logic
JavaScript AWS Lambda API Gateway DynamoDB S3 Cognito CloudWatch EventBridge Bootstrap
View on GitHub
